name: Udyam Registration
description: Mandatory registration to be recognized as an MSME. Enables access to government schemes.

name: Credit Guarantee Fund Scheme
description: Collateral-free credit for MSMEs from approved banks.

name: Trade License Delhi
description: Required for all commercial establishments operating in Delhi.

name: Pollution NOC (DPCC)
description: Mandatory for businesses involved in manufacturing or waste.
